User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

This problem only happen after last update to 8.0.  Now every time I click a drop down menu or try to scroll to the end of a list, Firefox will flash back to the top before a selection can be made.


Actual results:

I can't fill out forms or select a size when ordering from a web site.  Also scrolling bar doesn't work, when I click and hold to scroll to the bottom of a list, 


Expected results:

When clicking a drop down menu the menu should remain fixed so the user can actually see the topics available and select one.  The scrolling feature should allow scrolling to the bottom of a list rather than immediately returning to the top instantly.
